overview: Bradley Falk is the Chief Technology Officer of Poshly. He has worked as the Senior Architect at SecondMarket, the marketplace for trading private company stock and other alternative investments. At SecondMarket, Brad was responsible for building the companyâ€™s cutting-edge auction-based transaction platform. Brad was also a former Engineer at cosmetics brand, Bare Escentuals, a subsidiary of Shiseido. Bradley holds a B.Sc. in Computer Science from the University of Manitoba.
